UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the part of the UniProt entry that represents a peptide precursor.

Literature.Title: Quasiracemate Crystal Structures of Magainin 2 Derivatives Support the Functional Significance of the Phenylalanine Zipper Motif.
Literature.Author: Hayouka Z, Thomas NC, Mortenson DE, Satyshur KA, Weisblum B, Forest KT, Gellman SH

Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: Human erythrocytes:5% Hemolysis=25 µg/ml,Human erythrocytes:40% Hemolysis=100 µg/ml
